```{r}
library(dplyr)
`311_Service_Requests_from_2010_to_Present` <- read.csv("~/Desktop/project2/311_Service_Requests_from_2010_to_Present.csv")
request_short=`311_Service_Requests_from_2010_to_Present`
re.no=
  request_short%>%
  mutate(region=as.character(Incident.Zip))
count.df=re.no%>%
  group_by(region)%>%
  summarise(
  value=n()
  )
```

```{r}
library(devtools)
#install_github('arilamstein/choroplethrZip@v1.4.0')
#install_github("arilamstein/choroplethrCaCensusTract@v1.1.0")
library(choroplethrZip)
nyc_fips = c(36005, 36047, 36061, 36081, 36085)#zip code for new york city
zip_choropleth(count.df,
    title       = "Geographic Dispay of 311 Requests",
    legend      = "Number of complaints",
    county_zoom = nyc_fips
)
```
